title: PyroPet Kisa Cat Candle (Burgundy) - The Original Cat Candle with Metallic Skeleton | Halloween Decor | Unique Gift for Cat Lovers | 20-Hr Burn Time | Dimensions: 6.7x2.9x4.5 in
features: Unique Cat-Shaped Candle: The Kisa candle is a cute cat shaped candle that reveals the wild beast inside her, a grinning metallic skeleton with fire blazing in her eyes!

Icelandic Design: Crafted by Icelandic designer Thorunn Arnadottir, this candle captivates before, during, and after burning. Its intricate details and unique design make it a perfect conversation starter.

Quality Materials: Hand-poured with 100% pure paraffin wax and featuring a lead-free cotton wick for a cleaner burn. Inside awaits a durable aluminum skeleton. Sized 6.7 x 2.9 x 4.5 inches, enjoy a burn time of 20-25 hours.
Sustainable Packaging: Packaged in recyclable kraft paper and cushioned with plant-based, water-soluble packing materials.
Certified for Safety: The 'Kisa' cat candle meets stringent US and EU safety standards. Enjoy peace of mind knowing each light is synonymous with quality and safety.
